page.title: Basic Tutorial
page.p:
Hello! This tutorial contains the following:
Navigation: How to navigate your filesystem in bash
Top 25 commands: Some standalone bash commands for inspecting, searching, and editing files, and more.
Guided tasks: We'll now start seeing the true power of bash, which is not any of the commands in the previous section on its own, but the ability to string them together in pipelines and scripts. This section will guide you through some basic examples of this.
Exercises: Some further tasks except without guidance provided, but just a few possible answers and minimal commentary.
